name: Forest Adventure (itch)
description:
Adventure games is probably the most common theme when it comes to make adventure jumping games. itch.io App Store is full of arcade jumping games but it's still hard to find a good free jumping game for Android to live the real adventure with it, Isn't it string!

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "Forest Adventure", so be ready for a jumpy game experience. Jump games has a classic in adventure jumping game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free jumping adventure game. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play Forest Adventure:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the screen to jump, and try to avoid anything danger, except coins. That's all.

Feature of Forest Adventure:

  • Amazing and clean graphics
  • Simple and user friendly controls
  • Clean and hight quality sounds
  • Optimized for all Android devices including tabs
  • Google Plus sign in and leaderboard available

    • So are you ready to hit the game and live the adventure?

    It's a perfect and a must have this adventure game if you are bored with playing regular jumping games. Just download Forest Adventure and start your own adventure. Have fun !

    Don't forget to leave us rating and review to let us know what you think about Forest Adventure. We always want to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun jumping games for your Android. Your feedback plays an important role to be able to achieve this goal.
